pages.text: Affects struck or affected enemies. 33% chance to apply Weakness II on cast. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:focus/getting_started)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented.

pages.mod_text: You can feel your focus impart your scepters with a crippling energy. Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition.
